title: Memory Grid MAP Project and Collection submissions 2003
brief_description: Three short documentary films containing personal stories of memory and place, featuring interviews and a montage of images through the use of paintings and photographs. Focuses on the themes of isolation, multiculturalism and the migrant experience, and dreams of past and the future.
